features: A dewy shimmer delivered in an innovative jelly texture
Use solo to highlight the high points of your face: cheekbones, and bridge of nose; mix with moisturizer or primer for an all-over glow; or add to foundation for a customized glow
Iridescent sheen compliments all skin tones
Buildable highlight for customized level of radiance
body.description: SAY HALO to an iridescent, multi-faceted glow with NEW Almay Make Them Jelly™ Hi-Lite! Use solo to highlight the high points of your face: cheekbones, cupid’s bow and bridge of nose. Apply to collarbones and shoulders to make them pop. Mix with moisturizer or primer for an all-over glow. Add to foundation for a customized radiance.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Instantly illuminates and highlights.Buildable highlight for customized level of radiance.Adds moisture to skin.As always, hypoallergenic & fragrance free.

Almay Goddess Gloss Almay Smart Shade Makeup Almay Brow Pencil Almay Multi-Benefit Mascara Almay Oil Free Gentle Eye Makeup Remover Pads Explore More Almay Products A holographic lip gloss that transforms any lipstick with its sheer, layerable formula to create dazzling effects. Now available in 12 shades. Formulated with ToneMimic shade-sensing beads to intuitively transform makeup to your skin tone for all day, natural looking coverage in your perfect shade. For perfect brows, define with the pencil’s pointed tip, fill with the flat edge, and tame with the brush. Maximize your lashes with more volume, length, definition, and conditioning. Gently removes makeup, dirt and oil, even stubborn long-wearing and waterproof makeup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My FAVORITE highlighter
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using the Almay Unicorn highlighter for the past 7 years and I absolutely LOVE it. It’s a gel so it’s cooling and moisturizing and doesn’t feel heavy to apply. It does contain sparkles (which I love), but straight men will CONSTANTLY point out that you have sparkles on your face and boomer men will always giggle and say “hey you have something on your face” so take with that what you will. If you can stomach men speaking to you, then I recommend this highlighter! The blue and the pink are both great but I really do swear by the pink. It really helps to make your cheekbones pop!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Very pretty but broke me out
reviews.reviewText: Gave me a large keloid like pimple that will probably be gone in 2 months. That’s the left. Tiny pimples on the right. If it didn’t irritate my skin, I’d happily wear it. Lovely color, just not for my skin

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works really well for very fair skin
reviews.reviewText: I'm pale as a ghost and have a hard time finding various makeup products that don't come across as too garish. A lot of highlighters I've tried seem to be either way to glittery (like Twilight vampire glittery) or made me look like I was headed to a 70s disco party. This gel (jelly?) from Almay hits a sweet spot. It provides a very controllable amount of shimmer that is easy to apply, buildable, and isn't super shiny. I wasn't sure that the gold coloring would on my skin, but it provided a nice hint of warm glow that didn't scream fake. All that is needed is a little dab on each cheek. blend well, and you are left with a glow that looks natural rather than being blue or green or purple-hued. After some wandering on the interwebs, I saw where others had mixed in a little bit of this highlighter with their body lotion. This is a great way to impart the same warm glow to the rest of your skin without dropping more money on a teeny bottle of product. I liked that once the highlighter/lotion mixture dried on my skin, there was hardly any noticeable transfer on my clothes. The color did wear off a bit as the day went on. If you don't wash this off before going to bed, though, you will definitely have some sparkly bed sheets. I like the gentle glow and versatility of this highlighter, and prefer this medium compared to powder highlighters.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight shimmery and comfortable
reviews.reviewText: Great flexibility. Not Cakey. Light fluffy and feels natural
